title: By his Excellency the Lord General and the Council of State. Whereas information is given that severall persons disaffected to the peace of this Common-Wealth, upon occasion of the present change of government, do assemble together in a riotous and tumultuous manner ...
author: England and Wales. Council of State.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Giles Calvert, Thomas Brewster, and by and for Henry Hills,
